jrtr

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.Shape

  • public class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a 3D object. The shape references its geometry, that is, a triangle mesh stored in a VertexData object, its Material, and a transformation Matrix4f.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Material material 
      private javax.vecmath.Matrix4f t 
      private VertexData vertexData

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape(VertexData vertexData)
        Make a shape from VertexData. A shape contains the geometry (the VertexData), material properties for shading (a refernce to a Material), and a transformation Matrix4f.
        Parameters:
        vertexData - the vertices of the shape.

    • Method Detail

        public void setMaterial(Material material)
        Set a reference to a material for this shape.
        Parameters:
        material - the material to be referenced from this shape

      • getMaterial

        public Material getMaterial()
        To be implemented in the "Textures and Shading" project.
